Control Name: 1.14 Ensure API keys are restricted to only APIs that application needs access
Control Statement: API keys are insecure because they can be viewed publicly, such as from within a browser, or they can be accessed on a device where the key resides. It is recommended to restrict API keys to use (call) only APIs required by an application.
